name: PERVALIDUS CELERCURRE
description:
Kingdom: Animalia
Family: Lacerta
Genus: Pervalidus
Species: Celercurre

Pervalidus Celercurre or Yellow Flash Tail is the strongest and fastest animal in their family, they capable of running at 100 km/h. The lizard can be found in the mountainous regions of Novus Planet. The power of their arms and legs make them able to run fast even in the steep terrain. Their wings support their body weight when jumping from a height.

The lizard feeds on insects, their flicking tongue out to serve as a vibration finder for hunting purposes. Yellow Flash Tail is a solitary, noncolonized animal, which is why their body is filled with deadly protection. The head, body and tail horns serve as protection from other animals, with Neurotoxin and high-level Cardiotoxin toxins that open the nerves and paralyze the heart in seconds.
